name: AIMing For A Verdict
description:
The quaint little town of Quafog has been hit with a bank robbery! Who did the deed? The heiress socialite?
The reckless husband?
The sly vixen?
The grumpy music store owner?
The friendly neighbor?
The mysterious rogue?
Everyone has a secret - and everyone has a clue. Uncover the culprit in this Funtastic FMV game!
